akn:section.akn:heading: Model emergency response policies, procedures, and practices

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 1161l–1. Model emergency response policies, procedures, and practices The Secretary, in consultation with the Attorney General and the Secretary of Homeland Security, shall continue to—(1) advise institutions of higher education on model emergency response policies, procedures, and practices; and
(2) disseminate information concerning those policies, procedures, and practices.
(Pub. L. 89–329, title VIII, § 822, as added Pub. L. 110–315, title VIII, § 801, Aug. 14, 2008, 122 Stat. 3410.)
